sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default ({components, ...props}) => <MDXTag name="wrapper"  components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"pebble"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h1" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#pebble"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`pebble`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`A set of lightweight and accessible React component written in typescript and emotion.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"installation"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#installation"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Installation`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-shell"}}>{`yarn add @anarock/pebble
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"getting-started"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#getting-started"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Getting started`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`First of all you will need to install the fonts and icons used by the Design System.
Make sure the below code is executed at the very beginning.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The easier way is to use the cdn:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-html"}}>{`<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Roboto:400,500" rel="stylesheet">
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://unpkg.com/@anarock/pebble@[version]/dist/pebble.css"/>
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"using-icons-in-react-native"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#using-icons-in-react-native"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Using icons in React Native`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Add the following in your `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`package.json`}</MDXTag>{`;`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-json"}}>{`"rnpm": {
    "assets": {
        "./node_modules/@anarock/pebble/native/icons"
    }
}
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Then run `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`react-native link`}</MDXTag>{`.
and then it can be used by importing the Icon component.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-js"}}>{`import { Icon } from "@anarock/pebble/native"

// Usage
<Icon name="icon-name" size={20} color="#000000" />
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag></MDXTag>
